des: "Makes a very healthy, no-oil-added dressing with healthy fats from the avocado. Pure bliss and no guilt! Top any green salad with this dressing. Use agave nectar in place of honey for a vegan version."
ins: Blend avocado, orange, water, lime juice, ginger, garlic, soy sauce, agave nectar, red pepper flakes, and sea salt together in a blender or food processor until smooth and creamy.
